markdownRemark.html:
This section contains all information required for operating Open Data Hub in a production-grade cloud environment.

  • We maintain an opinionated reference architecture to setup, manage and operate a continous deployment pipeline.
  • We also share SRE (Site Reliability Engineering) principles and guidelines for managing the Operate First services.

Following are some examples of instances where we are deploying and operating ODH:

  • MOC
  • CRC
  • Quicklab
